website_summaries.verdict: The Meze 99 Classics are handsomely designed headphones that deliver an exciting audio experience.
pros: Excellent audio performance with articulate highs and ideal bass response
Lots of accessories, including detachable cables with inline remote controls
cons: Bulky design not necessarily ideal for mobile use

customer_reviews.title: Extremely comfortable - Very bassy
customer_reviews.text: Without a doubt these Meze 99 Neo's are one of the most comfortable pair of headphones that I have ever worn, even more than my ATH-M50x's. I could wear these for an entire day without feeling fatigued or having to take them off for a break - I would have to take my ATH-50x's off after approx. 20 / 30 minutes. Sound quality are on par with the ATH-50x's. The bass is a lot more noticable, but I felt that these were somewhat muffle at first. After getting use to the sound signature, it's barely noticeable now. The Meze 99 Neo's are definitely worth the €200
customer_reviews.author: Michael Devers

customer_reviews.title: They are extremely well made and look good. The sound is excellent
customer_reviews.text: These lovely headphones arrived on time. They are extremely well made and look good. The sound is excellent. They are delivered in a smart box and the speakers, cables etc are supplied in a well made zipped container. My only complaint, if I am really picky, is that the longer cable could have been a little longer for my use but a extension cable soon fitted the bill. A good deal all round.
customer_reviews.author: taffyman

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound
customer_reviews.text: Everybody raves about the walnut cups and retro looks but if I'm honest I'm still on the fence with these looks wise. One thing that's beyond question though is how great they sound. I must confess that I'm not much of a HiFi geek. I listen to these with a half decent turntable and amplifier. I chose them because they may not be neutral sounding or accurate but they make the most of every single track I listen to. They are lively and a perfect match for vinyl
customer_reviews.author: Francis

customer_reviews.title: I can see why people love this headphone.
customer_reviews.text: First off, This is a very lively energetic and engageing headphone which will give you goose bumps and the presentation of the sound is exactly that and sounds really good but remember your better off without garbage in and garbage out, to do these justice play flac or 320k mp3 files to make the most out of these headphones because i played youtube music and they sounded meh but not the case with flac or 320k mp3 so i hope that makes sense. Dan.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Martin

customer_reviews.title: Disgusting quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as they were recommended as a decent pair of wired headphones. When I opened them I found dried up glue all over the headphones as well as the ear cushions pulling away. The box etc was unblemished so they were put in like this at the factory, very bad quality control. Wouldn’t expect this from a pair of £30 headphones, let alone £180 ones
customer_reviews.author: MrBytesDude

customer_reviews.title: An Amazing Headphone 🎧
customer_reviews.text: Only received today, but already got a few hours under my belt. Build quality is fantastic. Looks (walnut and silver version) are stunning. Comfortable to wear. Sound stage is impressive for a closed back headphone. Will continue to use my Beyerdynamic T51i's for my daily commute, but the Mezes will be used for all other occasions. Great job Meze 5*'s.
customer_reviews.author: R1CKYDJ

customer_reviews.title: The headsets are great, really
customer_reviews.text: The headsets are great, really, they are. But you have to know what you're getting into. Wearing these in the summer season outside is not recommended as you will sweat your ears off listening to high quality music. Best used indoor with an amp. Great pair from Meze.
customer_reviews.author: Marius Radu

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Heard these at Canjam 2019 and fell in love with them. Great sound , light and comfortable. For the price there difficult to beat.
customer_reviews.author: Mr H

customer_reviews.title: Ok but not world beaters
customer_reviews.text: Nice sounding although vocals seem to get a bit list in the mix.Impressive but not the best
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Go for it !!
customer_reviews.text: Top class headphones. I consider myself as an audiophile and these killers are as good looking as they are good sounding. Never been so satisfied with headphones, even with more expensive ones
customer_reviews.author: Nicolas from Dublin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value for money.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely fine. Comfort is great. Solid bass - perfect for electro music. Combined with chord Mojo it makes a very efficient system.
customer_reviews.author: Fabienne KOFMAN

customer_reviews.title: Slight disappointment but pleased overall
customer_reviews.text: I just happened to get one with quite large woodgrains which did not look as good as the fine woodgrains seen in the picture. There are 2 very small surface blemishes where the wood finish has been chipped. Having said that, sound quality is great in my limited experience, lookes incredibly sleek, wires and adapters are very well designed and included in a neat package. Very unique product, I got this partly to support the work of the design team since I like the way it has been developed.
customer_reviews.author: Kahho

customer_reviews.title: Good but uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Pros - Very high quality in terms of materials - Very high quality sound Cons - Uncomfortable. The earpads were too shallow, and after an hour of contact my ears started to hurt. Overall, I recommend it if your ears are small or if you're OK with replacing the earpads, otherwise pick something else.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Client

customer_reviews.title: They are useless for listening to music
customer_reviews.text: I may have a duff pair, and these headphones have had rave reviews in the HiFi press, but I found them truly appalling, with the sound a deadful, far too bass heavy, mess. The cheap 20 quid Sennheisers I use with my ipod blow them out of the water and my wife's now 20 year old HiFi headphones, which were in much the same cost bracket, are in a completely different league. Sadly the Meze's are just about fit for use with a metal detector. They are useless for listening to music.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. D. Woolliscroft

customer_reviews.title: Amazing low-end good mids and meh highs.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing bass and low ends. Great value for money if you like edm or metal
customer_reviews.author: Cameron M.

product_meta.title: Meze 99 Classics Walnut Silver Headphones (Silver & Black)
product_meta.description:
Colour Name:Walnut SilverThe latest in the Classics series, the Meze 99 Classics promises to deliver perfect natural sound even to the pickiest of audio lovers.

BOX CONTAINS
1 x Headphone
3m cable
1.5m cable
adapter
carry case
feature_bullets: Two detachable 1.2 m with Mic. and 3 m Kevlar cables
Frequency range: 15 Hz - 25 KHz, Impedance: 32 Ohm, Sensitivity 103 Db 1kHz/1mW
Fully serviceable, only screws used in the build of the headphones
